replies.msg: My friend Alan works as a accounting manager at Hilton but if he takes the job at Big 4 he'll be four thousand dollars a month better off but he's better off now than a year ago when he was working below everybody else in the department. He thinks a junior accounting position is beneath him. If he hadn't taken the CPA exam last year he wouldn't be working as a manager now. If he had pursued a career in sales rather than accounting his salary would be much lower. If it hadn't been for his uncle's referral to Hilton his career wouldn't take off now and he wouldn't start earning a lot of money. He's been having a crush on this girl named Jo but Jo has a boyfriend. His friend said "I don't blame you. She's quite attractive" But he's beginning to realise he has no place in her scheme of things. He's just being a doormat so I told him to forget her. She's just not worth it. His father said "you'll be better off without her" His uncle too said "you would be better off without her" He's a science fiction fan. He said "if starships would exist I would quit my job and spend the rest of my life roaming the universe" Recently his sister married her childhood sweetheart. Her mother felt she was marrying beneath her though. Her auntie also feels her husband is beneath her. She enjoys socializing with the better off. Last month Alan was away on a business trip to Hokkaido. After his trip I said "if you should travel there again can you get me a pack of white lover cookies please?" Hes a computer expert. His cousin has to write a report which is due on Thursday but she's having problems with her computer. If Alan will go and fix her computer she'll be so thankful for his help. She also has exams next Monday so she's better off revising at home over the weekend. Alan is a kickboxing fan. His favourite fighter Dan has won his retirement fight lately. He's eternally grateful to his coaches and thankful that he's got a job as a colour commentator after he retired from the sport. All the fans wanna see Fred versus Randy. If Fred would sign a contract with the organisation Dana will make the fight happen. When randy was reading the terms and conditions of the contract dana's assistant said "if you would just sign here please" Alan's brother is a concierge in a hotel. I said "if it will make you happy I'll come to stay for a night as company for you while your colleagues are away" He threw a party yesterday. As some of us wanted to watch the news I said "if i could turn the television on please" He then said "sure. If you would switch to the news" By the end of the next century scientists will have invented starships. As I'm fascinated by the science of starships I'm going to ask physicist Dr. Chan about it. I'm gonna wait outside the lecture room at five to six. He'll have finished his lecture. I thought about phoning him at twenty five to two but my friend said "don't phone him now. He won't have finished his lecture yet" It's true that he wouldn't have finished teaching yet. I saw joey live twice which was marvelous and unforgettable. The first time I saw her concert with my friends we were late. I remember I said "look at the time. The concert will have begun" It was twenty past eight. The concert would've started by then. It was a worthwhile concert that was compelling enough to see again.

My friend Joe is an accounting manager at Hilton. If he takes the job at Big 4 he'll be four thousand five hundred dollars a month better off but he's still better off now than he was two years ago when he was working below everyone else in the department. He thinks a junior accountant position is beneath him. If he hadn't taken the CPA exam two years ago he wouldn't be working as a manager now. If he had pursued a career in sales rather than accounting his salary would be much lower now. If it hadn't been for his uncle's referral his career wouldn't take off now and he wouldn't start earning a lot of money. He's been having a crush on this girl named Joyce for eight years but Joyce has a boyfriend. His friend said "I don't blame you. She's quite attractive" But he's beginning to realise he has no place in her scheme of things. He's just being a doormat so I told him to forget her. She's just not worth it. His dad said "you'll be better off without her" His auntie also said "You would be better off without her" Joe is a science fiction fan. He said "If starships would exist I would quit my job and spend the rest of my life roaming the universe" His sister recently married her high school sweetheart. Her dad felt she was marrying beneath her though. Her uncle too feels her husband is beneath her. She enjoys socialising with the better off. Last month Joe was away on a business trip to Hokkaido. After the trip I said "If you should travel there again can you get me a pack of white lover cookies please?" Joe is a computer expert. His cousin has to write a report which is due on Tuesday but she's having problems with her computer. If Joe would go and fix her computer she will be so thankful for his help. She also has exams next Monday so she's better off revising at home over the weekend. Joe is a kickboxing fan. His favourite fighter Dan has won his retirement fight lately. He's eternally grateful to his coaches and thankful that he has got a job asa colour commentator after he retired from the sport. All the fans wanna see Fred versus Randy. If Fred will sign a deal with the organisation Dana will make the fight happen. When Randy was reading the terms and conditions of the contract Dana's assistant said "If you would just sign here please" Joe's brother works as a concierge in a hotel. I said "If it'll make you happy Ill come to stay for a night as company for you while your colleagues are away" Last Sunday Joe threw a party. As some of us wanted to watch the news I asked "If I could turn the television on please" He then said "Sure. If you would switch to the news" By the end of next century scientists will have invented starships. As I'm extremely interested in the science of starships I'm gonna ask professor Chan about it. I'm gonna wait outside the lecture room at twenty five to five. He'll have finished his lecture. I thought about phoning him at twenty five to two but my friend said "Don't phone him now. He won't have finished his lecture yet" It's true that he wouldn't have finished teaching yet. I saw Joey live twice with my friends at the Hong Kong Coliseum which was marvelous and unforgettable. The first time we saw her concert we were late. I remember I said "Look at the time. The concert will have begun" It was ten to eight. The concert would've started by then. It was a worthwhile concert which was compelling enough to see again.

既然啲ot 錢的士錢唔會當成隻engagement嘅staff cost，而係會另外charge返個客

咁既然啲的士錢飯錢最後都係要個客比

我本身識一啲考FE既人，有部份覺得唔好做或者公司長期唔點樣加人工，條path上去窄，做做下轉咗去做financial accounting 或者其他會計function

replies.msg:
做hk listed co.

你要升去FP&A既manager位, 多數係audit出身, 如果big 4 senior轉出黎, 咪俾senior financial analyst位你做, 之後升AM, 再升manager;

做得FP&A, 你最好要勁熟公司既operating procedures, d數點走, 點分,點攤, 要知道FI同Mgt act入數既分別 (要reconcile); 如果公司本身有reporting tools (勁少公司有), 你要用SAP generate data再落excel 做完全無standard format既analysis; 最好自學VBA, 再加埋Power BI, 當然要建議公司盡快買reporting tools, 由SAP轉出黎個下直接係入面generate reports, 否則做死你; 如果做retail下下幾百間stores, 你每個月要整by stores, by district, by zone, by geographical areas, by countries既一連串analysis, trend analysis, 解variance vs LM vs Budget.

Sales analysis最多野整, Sales by brands, by stors, by payment means, Gross Sales, net of discounts, coupon, .....

FRS 16都整死你: 就算入數SAP行FRS 16, 分分鐘有膠層問你從HKAS 17角度既rental係幾多.....兩邊你都要知, 當然, 好多公司行FRS 16未買software去處理, 用excel又係crazy complex, 呢排勁多rent concession, 又要不停lease amendment, 同重做一次無分別....

做每一個重要既商業決定又要計一輪sensitivity analysis, 做同唔做既financial impact有幾大呢?

財政預算案對公司既financial impact係幾多呢? 今年BR,licence, 水電煤全部要計;

做competitve analysis, 如果同時有幾間comparable sized既competitors, 你每半年又要做一輪analysis...


最痛苦係每年做budgeting, 要問哂所以cost centers拎budget數, 要同sales operation 夾budget P&L, 佢地永遠想你set細d sales, set大d exp, 你每時每刻要諗佢地邊句真邊句假, 之後又要一層一層咁同意先過到

做FP&A你要同好多人交手, 溝通能力要強, 要說服得掂你老細(CFO),又壓得住佢唔俾佢既無限要求不停發大, 否則你晚晚十二點都做唔切

我SA2個陣試過帶隻list co, 比早2年少左個mgr + s1, 樓下得2個a2 + 1個intern (a21個recurr+1個乜q都唔識), 對上就principal
傾job 個陣係比principal鬧我點解side時間教乜都唔識個a2 做野, 唔叫recurr 個a2 教

audit 呢行唔係咁on9 點會比人鬧足咁多年, 你女朋友做緊最輕鬆既A1都咁, 你估個 sic 每日有冇2-3個鐘訓, 點會有時間教
做a1 都覺得大壓力, 佢真係唔適合audit

同埋得罪講句, 女朋友講既野信一半好
你估個sm 唔知邊d 野A1 要識, 邊d 野sic 亂咁A落去咩
audit 好講分級, 正常sm 係連屌班A都覺得side 時間, 會叫sic 去做
直屌個A1得黎又唔屌埋sic, 會唔會佢本身都錯左好多低能野 / A1 要識既野 / 或者d 好嚴重而可以避免既錯

a1/intern 永遠都好似撞邪咁, 會錯埋d 解釋唔到既野, 比人屌完下次唔好再錯咪算囉
上面講個隻job個 intern, 同事教左佢點做bank section, 都可以拎張10月 bank statement 去問個客點解對唔到tb (12月)個數, 個客好熟所以冇屌佢笑笑口叫佢番黎問我就算, 如果係big4 大客, 應該比人投訴左好耐

呢行係好惡頂, 客又年年跳草裙舞r 減fee, 人工又年年加, 要維持recovery, d job 每1-2年就陰d陰d cut 1個人
早10年8年前10個人既job, 而家可能得番4-5個人做(或更小), job allocation / proj mgt幾好都仆街
加上個個講到audit 係人間煉獄, 醒目既都唔入黎或者一早走左, 呢個年頭唔係比錢就請到人
d firm 為左唔short 咁多人, 乜狗屎垃圾都請. 之前big4 secret 都有人屌HR 咪再請某2nd tier 既staff, 橫掂d 野都唔得, 寧願自己袋番d OT 好過
唔夠人, d 人唔掂, 越錯得多就越花更多時間去睇同修改, 跟本係惡性循環, 呢行都係早走早著啦
